description_for_model: Cortex is an EVM-compatible Layer 2 blockchain designed specifically for AI agents. It provides: (1) AgentRegistry for onchain agent identity with metadata, pubkeys, and capability hashes; (2) PolicyModule for ERC-4337 smart account enforcement of spend limits, target allowlists, and function-level permissions; (3) IntentBook for EIP-712 signed intent submission with constraint-based solver execution; (4) Indexer that ingests all contract events into Postgres; (5) REST API for querying agents, intents, policies, and transaction explanations; (6) MCP server with tools: lookup_agent, list_open_intents, get_policy, explain_tx, lookup_attestation. Full documentation at /llms.txt and /llms-full.txt. Markdown docs at /docs/*.md.
